keyMappings:
# I prefer explicit opt-in, so I've disabled all the default key maps and only define the ones that I'll be using.
# This also avoids unnecessary key collision between vimium and website's key maps.
#
# Available commands: https://github.com/philc/vimium/blob/6c801f39e16b9a159870c31cf0adba9789286883/background_scripts/all_commands.js
# Default key mappings: https://github.com/philc/vimium/blob/6c801f39e16b9a159870c31cf0adba9789286883/background_scripts/commands.js#L405

unmapAll

# Navigation
map j scrollDown
map k scrollUp
map h scrollLeft
map l scrollRight
map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom
map d scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp

# Arc's keybinding was cmd+shift+c
map yy copyCurrentUrl

# Enter a mode to open any links visible on the page in the current or new tab
map f LinkHints.activateMode
map F LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab

# Vomnibar
map b Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

# Navigating history
# map H goBack
# TODO: This collides with goto line on GitHub
# map L goForward

# Manipulating tabs
map K nextTab
map J previousTab
map t createTab
map x removeTab
map X restoreTab

# Misc
# TODO: This collides with the help menu on GitHub
# map ? showHelp
searchEngines:
# Reference: https://github.com/philc/vimium/wiki/Search-Engines
#
# I already have multiple search engines configured in Firefox so I don't know if it's worth having
# them here as well as I don't really use Vomnibar except for bookmarks
